traceability.evidence: The `require-branch-annotation` rule’s implementation (src/rules/require-branch-annotation.ts) defines meta.schema as an empty array and hardcodes the set of branch node types (IfStatement, SwitchCase, TryStatement, etc.) with no provision for user configuration. The story’s Requirements include **REQ-CONFIGURABLE-SCOPE** (“Allow configuration of which branch types require annotations”), but there is no schema entry or code path to accept or honor configuration options. No tests exercise configuration of branch types.
traceability.notes: Core detection is implemented and covered by tests, but the configurability requirement (REQ-CONFIGURABLE-SCOPE) is missing, so the story is not fully satisfied.
